title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Massive tropical bat is surprisingly family oriented, rare videos show
items.description: New footage reveals spectral bats “hugging,” playing, and bringing food to their young

items.title: Neutrino astronomers set biggest traps ever for messengers from cosmic accelerators
items.description: Country-size array of radio antennas could trace ultra–high-energy particles back to supernovae and black holes

items.title: Facing ‘impossible’ workload, USDA struggles to oversee lab animal welfare
items.description: Shrinking staff and other handicaps threaten enforcement of federal law that protects research animals

items.title: As salmon in Alaska plummet, scientists home in on a killer
items.description: Chinook in the Yukon River appear to be particularly vulnerable to a common parasite—and warming waters may be abetting the infection

items.title: NIH director orders new review of grants in outline of top research priorities
items.description: Many topics on Bhattacharya’s list are familiar, but order to re-evaluate grants draws concerns

items.title: Fossilized fish trails reveal earliest steps out of water
items.description: Possible lungfish tracks could push back animal migration onto land by 10 million years

items.title: Don’t blame the algorithm: Polarization may be inherent in social media
items.description: In simulations, AI-generated users of stripped-down social media without content algorithms still split into polarized echo chambers

items.title: Hot springs’ hardy microbes offer new source of antibiotics
items.description: The mysterious branch of life of known as archaea harbor unique bacteria-fighting compounds

items.title: Thousands of climbing catfish filmed scaling waterfalls
items.description: New footage provides rare insight into the daring migration of an enigmatic fish

items.title: Researchers make ‘quantum cat’ video out of individual atoms
items.description: Demo showcases new AI-powered tool of potential use in quantum computers
